generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface made of cobblestones, extending into the distance with visible lane markings and curbs.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible on both sides of the road, with curbs separating them from the road, and people walking on them.
- building: Multiple buildings with commercial storefronts and signage (e.g., "Barmenia") are visible along the street.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the right side of the street and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalks and crossing the street.
- car: A white car is visible parked on the right side of the road, and another car is visible further down the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those for streetlights and traffic signs.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign with a black symbol (likely a warning sign) is visible on a pole.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible on the right side of the street, near the buildings.
